dct_title_s: South Asia : oil and gas activity and concession map 2013
dct_description_sm: Depths shown by isolines and gradient tints. Shows gas fields, oil fields, gas pipelines, oil pipelines, refineries, concession blocks. "Map data corrected as of May 2013" Includes statistical tables, and advertisements.
